#!/bin/bash
# Push local changes to GitHub and open repo in browser

# 1. Make sure we're in the right folder
cd "$(dirname "$0")"

# 2. Pull latest changes
git pull origin main

# 3. Stage all changes
git add .

# 4. Commit changes (message auto-generated with timestamp)
git commit -m "Update project files on $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No changes to commit"

# 5. Push to GitHub
git push origin main

# 6. Open GitHub repo in default browser (Windows-compatible)
start "" "https://github.com/khustle9290/5-number-generator"
